a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Actual teaching time vs. time teachers are present, 2016
The vertical axis shows the percentage of time officially allocated to schooling that a teacher is present in the
classroom. The horizontal axis shows the percentage of time officially allocated to schooling that a teacher is actually
teaching. In some cases estimates correspond to selected regions and are therefore not necessarily nationally
Percentage of scheduled time teacher is teaching
Percentage of scheduled time teacher is present in classroom
Data source: Teaching time lost - World Development Report (2018)
